text: La Pampa is a province of Argentina. It is in the center of the country. Very few people live there. ==History== In 1952, the province was renamed after Eva Per√≥n. In 1955, it was changed back to La Pampa. ==Economy== Agriculture gives a fourth to La Pampa's economy. The most important activity is cattle ranching. Other livestock include sheep, goats and pigs. ==References==
title: La Pampa Province
